title: So WARNING: foul language
body:
i get into a game everyones cool no ones raging im doing pretty good not on tilt 
now before i go on it wasnt me who was raging im still in a pretty good mood

but this vayne bruh in the whole game has 
Called me an autistic %%%got
Told me to kill my self
Told me he hopes i die of cancer
Told me he hopes my family dies
Told me to F*** my self my whole family etc
an a whole bunch of other slurs an what not to make fun of me an the whole time i can only think is why is this dude still playing league? i get its bronze but why isint riot slapping this dude with an IP ban or somethin? im sure its not the first time he has gone screeching into a game like that :| 

dont get why his team didint tell him to stop or what just let him do it may or may not have supported his actions dont get it

replies.body: And this is why the mute button exists :D

IP bans are so 1990. They do not work anymore, unless you pay extra for a static IP address (for business, servers, ect) all you have to do to bypass it is restart your router.
Permbanning people is utterly impossible, all they can do is delete accounts.
But yes, this guy will get banned for sure with that sort of attitude.

{{champion:110}} : Vayne tell him/her your sorry

{{champion:53}} (Shows his Powerfist)

{{champion:67}} : Make me!

{{champion:254}} (Shows her gauntlets)

{{champion:53}} (Looks at her and blushes)

{{champion:110}} : Vayne...

{{champion:67}} : Fine! I'm sorry for being a dick to you, happy Varus?

{{champion:110}} : Yes.
